definicao:
SELECT id AS source_id,
    url,
    upper(regexp_replace(COALESCE((regexp_match(title, '^\s*([A-Z0-9_]+)\s*[-â€“]'::text))[1], ( SELECT t.t
           FROM unnest(duc.tags) t(t)
          WHERE (NOT ((t.t ~* '^(BDGD|SIG-?R|Distribuicao)$'::text) OR (t.t ~ '^[0-9]{4}$'::text) OR (t.t ~ '^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}$'::text)))
          ORDER BY (length(t.t)) DESC
         LIMIT 1)), '[^A-Z0-9_]'::text, '_'::text, 'g'::text)) AS distribuidora,
    COALESCE((regexp_match(title, '(\d{4}(?:-\d{2}-\d{2})?)$'::text))[1], ( SELECT t.t
           FROM unnest(duc.tags) t(t)
          WHERE (t.t ~ '^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$'::text)
         LIMIT 1), ( SELECT t.t
           FROM unnest(duc.tags) t(t)
          WHERE (t.t ~ '^\d{4}$'::text)
         LIMIT 1)) AS ref_raw,
    foi_importado,
    ultima_verificacao
   FROM dataset_url_catalog duc
  WHERE (url IS NOT NULL);

SELECT l.uc_id,
    l.import_id,
    l.cod_id,
    l.distribuidora_id,
    l.origem,
    l.ano,
    l.status,
    l.data_conexao,
    l.cnae,
    l.grupo_tensao,
    l.modalidade,
    l.tipo_sistema,
    l.situacao,
    l.classe,
    l.segmento,
    l.subestacao,
    l.municipio_id,
    l.bairro,
    l.cep,
    l.pac,
    l.pn_con,
    l.descricao,
    l.latitude,
    l.longitude,
    l.created_at,
    l.updated_at,
    l.id,
    COALESCE(l.latitude, p.latitude) AS latitude_final,
    COALESCE(l.longitude, p.longitude) AS longitude_final
   FROM (lead_bruto l
     LEFT JOIN ponto_notavel p ON ((l.pn_con = p.pn_id)));

SELECT DISTINCT ON (lead_bruto_id) lead_bruto_id,
    resultado AS enriquecimento_status,
    executado_em
   FROM lead_enrichment_log lel
  ORDER BY lead_bruto_id, executado_em DESC;

SELECT lead_bruto_id,
    avg(COALESCE(energia_ponta, (0)::double precision)) AS media_energia_ponta,
    avg(COALESCE(energia_fora_ponta, (0)::double precision)) AS media_energia_fora_ponta,
    avg(COALESCE(energia_total, (0)::double precision)) AS media_energia_total,
    sum(COALESCE(energia_total, (0)::double precision)) AS soma_energia_total
   FROM lead_energia_mensal lem
  GROUP BY lead_bruto_id;

SELECT lead_bruto_id,
    avg(COALESCE(demanda_ponta, (0)::double precision)) AS media_demanda_ponta,
    avg(COALESCE(demanda_fora_ponta, (0)::double precision)) AS media_demanda_fora_ponta,
    avg(COALESCE(demanda_contratada, (0)::double precision)) AS media_demanda_contratada,
    sum(COALESCE(demanda_total, (0)::double precision)) AS soma_demanda_total
   FROM lead_demanda_mensal ldm
  GROUP BY lead_bruto_id;

SELECT lead_bruto_id,
    avg(COALESCE(dic, (0)::double precision)) AS media_dic,
    avg(COALESCE(fic, (0)::double precision)) AS media_fic,
    sum(COALESCE(sem_rede, (0)::double precision)) AS total_horas_sem_rede
   FROM lead_qualidade_mensal lqm
  GROUP BY lead_bruto_id;

SELECT lb.uc_id,
    lb.import_id,
    lb.cod_id,
    lb.distribuidora_id,
    lb.origem,
    lb.ano,
    lb.status,
    lb.data_conexao,
    lb.cnae,
    lb.grupo_tensao,
    lb.modalidade,
    lb.tipo_sistema,
    lb.situacao,
    lb.classe,
    lb.segmento,
    lb.subestacao,
    lb.municipio_id,
    lb.bairro,
    lb.cep,
    lb.pac,
    lb.pn_con,
    lb.descricao,
    lb.latitude,
    lb.longitude,
    lb.created_at,
    lb.updated_at,
    lb.id,
    c.descricao AS cnae_descricao,
    s.descricao AS segmento_desc,
    m.nome AS municipio_nome,
    m.uf,
    d.nome AS distribuidora_nome
   FROM ((((lead_bruto lb
     LEFT JOIN cnae c ON (((c.id)::text = (lb.cnae)::text)))
     LEFT JOIN segmento_mercado s ON ((s.id = lb.segmento)))
     LEFT JOIN municipio m ON ((m.id = lb.municipio_id)))
     LEFT JOIN distribuidora d ON ((d.id = lb.distribuidora_id)));

SELECT lb.uc_id,
    lb.import_id,
    lb.cod_id,
    lb.distribuidora_id,
    lb.origem,
    lb.ano,
    lb.status,
    lb.data_conexao,
    lb.cnae,
    lb.grupo_tensao,
    lb.modalidade,
    lb.tipo_sistema,
    lb.situacao,
    lb.classe,
    lb.segmento,
    lb.subestacao,
    lb.municipio_id,
    lb.bairro,
    lb.cep,
    lb.pac,
    lb.pn_con,
    lb.descricao,
    lb.latitude,
    lb.longitude,
    lb.created_at,
    lb.updated_at,
    lb.id,
    c.descricao AS cnae_descricao,
    s.descricao AS segmento_desc,
    m.nome AS municipio_nome,
    m.uf,
    d.nome AS distribuidora_nome,
    cc.latitude_final,
    cc.longitude_final,
    energia.media_energia_ponta,
    energia.media_energia_fora_ponta,
    energia.media_energia_total,
    energia.soma_energia_total,
    demanda.media_demanda_ponta,
    demanda.media_demanda_fora_ponta,
    demanda.media_demanda_contratada,
    demanda.soma_demanda_total,
    qualidade.media_dic,
    qualidade.media_fic,
    qualidade.total_horas_sem_rede,
    enr.enriquecimento_status,
    enr.executado_em AS data_enriquecimento
   FROM (((((((((lead_bruto lb
     LEFT JOIN cnae c ON (((c.id)::text = (lb.cnae)::text)))
     LEFT JOIN segmento_mercado s ON ((s.id = lb.segmento)))
     LEFT JOIN municipio m ON ((m.id = lb.municipio_id)))
     LEFT JOIN distribuidora d ON ((d.id = lb.distribuidora_id)))
     LEFT JOIN lead_com_coordenadas cc ON ((cc.uc_id = lb.uc_id)))
     LEFT JOIN vw_lead_energia_agg energia ON ((energia.lead_bruto_id = lb.id)))
     LEFT JOIN vw_lead_demanda_agg demanda ON ((demanda.lead_bruto_id = lb.id)))
     LEFT JOIN vw_lead_qualidade_agg qualidade ON ((qualidade.lead_bruto_id = lb.id)))
     LEFT JOIN vw_lead_status_enriquecimento enr ON ((enr.lead_bruto_id = lb.id)));

SELECT id,
    title,
    url,
    tags,
    url_hash,
    foi_importado,
    created,
    modified,
    origem,
    tipo,
    snippet,
    ultima_verificacao,
    observacoes,
    (regexp_match(title, '(\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2})$'::text))[1] AS data_str,
    to_date((regexp_match(title, '(\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2})$'::text))[1], 'YYYY-MM-DD'::text) AS data_ref,
    (EXTRACT(year FROM to_date((regexp_match(title, '(\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2})$'::text))[1], 'YYYY-MM-DD'::text)))::integer AS ano,
    btrim(regexp_replace(title, '\s*-\s*\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$'::text, ''::text, 'g'::text)) AS distribuidora
   FROM dataset_url_catalog duc;
